description:
Aoi used to celebrate her birthday only with Miyabi as her parents normally were busy. So Kaoru wants to make it a special event for Aoi this time.
When they go shopping together Kaoru sees a beautiful dress in a store window and wonders how it would suit Aoi. Being a poor student, he secretly accepts several part-time jobs. But while he is working day and night, Aoi is feeling lonely and is afraid Kaoru is avoiding her - is she not good enough as his fiancée?
